params.tokenCollateralAddress: Address of token to deposit as collateral

params.collateralAddress: ERC20 collat to liquidate from the user
params.debtToCover: Amount of eNRS to burn to improve the users health
params.user: User whose health factor is broken

params._amountToMint: The amount of eNRS to mint

liquidate(address,address,uint256).notice: Can partially liquidate userCan get liqidatation bonusAssumes protocol will be roughly 200% overcollateralized

minteNRS(uint256).notice: They must have aminimum   collateral value to mint

documentation.text:
@param tokenCollateralAddress Address of token to deposit as collateral
 @param amountCollateral  amount to deposit

@param _amountToMint  The amount of eNRS to mint
 @notice They must have aminimum   collateral value to mint
@dev Donot call unless checking for healthfactor
